text: S.C.O. Roubaix is a former football club which played in France. The club formed from a merger of two football clubs ; Racing Stade Roubaisien and Roubaix Football in 1990. ==Name - Racing Stade Roubaisien== *1895-1944 Racing Club de Roubaix *1944-1963 in C.O. Roubaix-Tourcoing *1963-1990 Racing Stade Roubaisien ==Name - Roubaix Football== *1928-1944 Excelsior Athlétic Club de Roubaix *1944-1970 in C.O. Roubaix-Tourcoing *1970-1977 Excelsior Athlétic Club de Roubaix *1977-1990 Roubaix Football Category:French football clubs Category:Roubaix
title: S.C.O. Roubaix
